title: Vi's Ultimate gets interupted
body: My Vi Ultimate has been interupted by a yasuo q + r and an azir r, while the description clearly says that "vi cannot be interupted while charging"

replies.body: "cannot be interupted" <---- to op, as and adc you cant do anything ,100% 1shot, you dont have any safe for this, just 1 reason, to uninstall
